title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Collaborative Problem-Based Mathematics Instructional Design in 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design problem-based mathematics learning scenarios in 3D virtual environments
Learners can apply at least three strategies to minimize cognitive load in collaborative design processes
Learners can produce instructional materials utilizing key technical elements such as 3D model uploads and interactive menu design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
